scripts.ios: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace greatfeel.xcworkspace -scheme greatfeel -configuration Debug -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' -derivedDataPath build && xcrun simctl install booted build/Build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator/greatfeel.app && xcrun simctl launch booted com.greatfeel.app
scripts.ios:build: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace greatfeel.xcworkspace -scheme greatfeel -configuration Debug -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' build
